item.title: Install Calico
item.description: Apply the Calico manifest from the aws/amazon-vpc-cni-k8s GitHub project. This creates the daemon sets in the kube-system namespace. kubectl apply -f https://raw.githubusercontent.com/aws/amazon-vpc-cni-k8s/master/config/v1.6/calico.yaml Let’s go over few key features of the Calico manifest: We see an annotation throughout; annotations are a way to attach non-identifying metadata to objects. This metadata is not used internally by Kubernetes, so they cannot be used to identify within k8s. Instead, they are used by external tools and libraries.
